items.sentence: I'm buying flowers because I'm going to visit my grandmother this evening.
At the bottom of the letter he wrote "Kind regards," then signed his name.
Tom seemed to understand why Mary didn't want to go to Australia with him.
I don't need you to remind me of anything. I know what I'm supposed to do.
I see that your manners haven't exactly improved in the last twenty years.
Tom told me that he planned to visit Mary the next time he went to Boston.
Tom told me he thought that the dress that Mary was wearing was too short.
Tom said he didn't believe Mary really planned on going bowling with John.
My parents and I have different ideas about what time my curfew should be.
What do you think? Which ones should we take? I like both those and those.
